name: Take A Break (Michael Pan)
description:
Story

You're been prison by some scientist who want to test your ability.

Take a break on the chair and start breaking out.

Control

WSAD and Space to move and jump.

E to interact with other items.

Development

This is the first time I work on puzzle game, it's really difficult for me to come up with levels.

Credit

Most of the arts and programming in this game is made by myself.

The brick tile was altered from Kings and pigs.

I used ecrett for create music, and used Bfxr for the sound effect.
